skills.name: OpenTelemetry
skills.pattern: const tracer = trace.getTracer('service'); const span = tracer.startSpan('operation');

skills.name: Distributed Tracing
skills.pattern: Trace ID propagation via headers, parent-child spans, baggage

skills.name: Jaeger
skills.pattern: Span collection, service graphs, latency analysis

skills.name: Zipkin
skills.pattern: B3 propagation, dependency diagrams

skills.name: Structured Logging
skills.pattern: logger.info({event: 'user.login', userId, duration, metadata})

skills.name: Log Levels
skills.pattern: TRACE < DEBUG < INFO < WARN < ERROR < FATAL

skills.name: Correlation IDs
skills.pattern: req.id = uuid(); logger.child({correlationId: req.id})

skills.name: ELK Stack
skills.pattern: Elasticsearch + Logstash + Kibana, index patterns, queries

skills.name: Loki
skills.pattern: Labels-based, LogQL queries, Grafana integration

skills.name: Fluentd/Fluent Bit
skills.pattern: Input -> Filter -> Buffer -> Output pipeline

skills.name: Prometheus Metrics
skills.pattern: Counter, Gauge, Histogram, Summary types

skills.name: PromQL
skills.pattern: rate(http_requests_total[5m]), histogram_quantile(0.95, ...)

skills.name: Grafana Dashboards
skills.pattern: Panels, variables, alerts, annotations

skills.name: StatsD
skills.pattern: client.increment('api.calls'); client.timing('api.latency', duration)

skills.name: RED Method
skills.pattern: Rate, Errors, Duration - per endpoint

skills.name: USE Method
skills.pattern: Utilization, Saturation, Errors - per resource

skills.name: Four Golden Signals
skills.pattern: Latency, Traffic, Errors, Saturation

skills.name: Application Performance
skills.pattern: Datadog, New Relic, Dynatrace - auto instrumentation

skills.name: Error Tracking
skills.pattern: Sentry, Bugsnag - stack traces, breadcrumbs, releases

skills.name: Real User Monitoring
skills.pattern: Page load, FCP, LCP, CLS, FID measurements

skills.name: Alert Rules
skills.pattern: ALERT HighErrorRate IF error_rate > 0.01 FOR 5m

skills.name: PagerDuty Integration
skills.pattern: Escalation policies, on-call schedules, runbooks

skills.name: Alert Fatigue
skills.pattern: Actionable alerts only, proper thresholds, grouping

skills.name: SLI/SLO/SLA
skills.pattern: SLI: metric, SLO: target (99.9%), SLA: contract

skills.name: Error Budgets
skills.pattern: 100% - SLO = error budget, spend on features vs reliability

skills.name: Health Checks
skills.pattern: /health/live, /health/ready - liveness vs readiness

skills.name: Dependency Checks
skills.pattern: Check DB, cache, external APIs in health endpoint

skills.name: Continuous Profiling
skills.pattern: Pyroscope, Parca - CPU, memory, goroutine profiles

skills.name: Flame Graphs
skills.pattern: Stack trace sampling, width = time spent

skills.name: Chaos Engineering
skills.pattern: Chaos Monkey, Gremlin - inject failures, verify recovery
